Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. It's a unique and valuable item that has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality. Given its exceptional nature, I believe it would greatly benefit you and align well with your needs and interests. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $9,500 for this exclusive product. I am confident that this offer presents an excellent value proposition for you, allowing you to secure an item that is both rare and highly beneficial. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
